entry.title: Hello, Welcome to My Domain,
entry.summary: I'm Donn, a reclusive creative creature who wears many masks and aspires to be a better human than they were before. I'm an explorer of the human condition, expanding and healing mine while helping others through performance art and personal development experiences.
entry.content:
I'm Donn, a reclusive creative creature who wears many masks and aspires to be a better human than they were before.

I'm an explorer of the human condition, expanding and healing mine while helping others through performance art and personal development experiences.
